summary.span: Represents a control with a single piece of content of any type.

span.span: Represents a control with a single piece of content of any type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以包含任何类型的公共语言运行时对象 (如字符串或对象) 或对象 (如或)。The can contain any type of common language runtime object (such as a string or a object) or a object (such as a or a ). 这使您可以向控件添加丰富的内容，例如和。This enables you to add rich content to controls such as and . 下图显示四个按钮，其属性设置为以下值之一：The following illustration shows four buttons whose property is set to one of the following: - 一个字符串。A string. - 一个 对象。A object. - 一个 对象。A object. - 一个控件包含其他对象。A control that contains other objects. ![四个按钮](~/add/media/controlcontentmodelbuttons.PNG "四个按钮")![Four buttons](~/add/media/controlcontentmodelbuttons.PNG "Four buttons") 与不同类型的内容的四个按钮Four buttons with different types of content 一个具有有限的默认样式。A has a limited default style. 如果你想要提高控件的外观，可以创建一个新。If you want to enhance the appearance of the control, you can create a new . 有关详细信息，请参阅 [数据模板化概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md)。For more information, see [Data Templating Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md). 另一个典型方案是使用以显示有关中的选定项的详细信息控件。Another typical scenario is to use the to show more information about an item selected in an control. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 将绑定到集合并显示基于所选内容的信息](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-bind-to-a-collection-and-display-information-based-on-selection.md)。For more information, see [How to: Bind to a Collection and Display Information Based on Selection](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-bind-to-a-collection-and-display-information-based-on-selection.md). 该控件的依赖关系属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style. 如果属性设置为默认样式，该属性可能会更改从其默认值时该控件将出现在应用程序中。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 桌面主题使用应用程序运行时确定的默认样式。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认 WPF 主题](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建备注部分中所示的四个按钮。The following example demonstrates how to create the four buttons shown in the Remarks section. > [!NOTE] > 尽管[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]版本的示例可以使用``内容的每个按钮周围的标记，不需要。Although the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] version of the example could use the `` tags around the content of each button, it is not necessary. 有关详细信息，请参阅[XAML 概述 (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-overview-wpf.md)。For more information, see [XAML Overview (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-overview-wpf.md). [!code-xaml[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#1)] [!code-csharp[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#2)] [!code-vb[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#2)] 下面的示例演示如何进行样式，使控件具有增强的可视外观。The following example shows how to make a style for a so that the control has an enhanced visual appearance. [!code-xaml[ContentControl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContentControl/CSharp/Page1.xaml#1)] [!code-xaml[ContentControl#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContentControl/CSharp/Page1.xaml#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以是预定义、 撰写的或自定义字符串格式。 can be a predefined, composite, or custom string format. 有关字符串格式的详细信息，请参阅[格式设置类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information about string formats, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). 如果您设置或的属性，则属性将被忽略。If you set the or property of a , the property is ignored. ## Examples 下面的示例指定的格式通过设置对象属性中的并将应用到两个对象，它们继承自。The following example specifies the format of objects by setting the property in a and applying the to two objects, which inherit from . summary.span: Gets or sets a template selector that enables an application writer to provide custom template-selection logic.

span.span: Gets or sets a template selector that enables an application writer to provide custom template-selection logic.
A data template selector.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，创建时有多个为同一类型的对象，并且您想要提供您自己的逻辑来选择应用基于每个数据对象的属性。Typically, you create a when you have more than one for the same type of objects and you want to supply your own logic to choose a to apply based on the properties of each data object. 请注意，如果有不同的对象类型，您可以设置属性上的。Note that if you have objects of different types you can set the property on the . 如果您这样做，则无需创建。If you do that, then there is no need to create a . 此外，如果对象的类型相同但具有不同的属性，还可以考虑使用或数据转换器。Furthermore, if you have objects of the same type but with different properties, you can also consider using a or a data converter. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [数据模板化概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md)。For more information, see [Data Templating Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md). 若要创建一个模板选择器，创建一个类继承自并重写方法。To create a template selector, create a class that inherits from and override the method. 您的类定义后，可以将类的实例分配给您的元素的模板选择器属性。After your class is defined, you can assign an instance of the class to the template selector property of your element. 如果这两个和设置的属性，则忽略此属性。If both the and the properties are set, then this property is ignored. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```
